articles.content: Mumbai: Analysts retained their bullish calls on Titan and raised price targets on the stock after India's largest branded jewellery maker reported a 25% jump in fourth quarter revenue (from operatio… [+1187 chars]

articles.author: ET Bureau
articles.title: AMNS India to invest $7.4 billion on capacity expansion, value addition - Economic Times
articles.description: ArcelorMittal and Nippon Steel's joint venture, AMNS India, will invest $7.4bn in capacity expansion and increased value-added capabilities. The investment includes increasing the Hazira-based plant's upstream capacity to 15 million tonnes by 2026, alongside …
